name: 華國媛
objective:
本門授課之目的在於介紹奈米材料及其製程 (包括化學法及物理法奈米材料法)，並探討奈米材料的未來發展及應用。所包括的課程主題如下：1. 奈米材料與奈米化學簡介。2. 奈米材料與結構分析 3. 量子力學；4. 奈米材料自我組成 5. 奈米材料模擬 6. 碳化奈米材料 7 奈米材料製成 8. 奈米材料的應用；9. 奈米材料的遠景與未來發展。
The course introduces nanomaterials and their preparation processes (including chemical method and physical methods). Future development and applications are also discussed. This course will cover the following topics:1. Introduction of nanomaterials and Nano-chemistry; 2. Nanomaterials: structure and analysis; 3. Quantum mechanics; 4. Nanomaterials: self-assembly; 5. Nanomaterials: simulation; 6. Carbon-based nanomaterials; 7. Synthesis and processing 8. Growth and application of semiconductor nanoparticles; 9. Prospective future of nanomaterials.
schedule:
Week        Title
1      Introduction on nanomarterials- nanotechnology in the ancient days and nature
2.     Different types of nanomaterials - OD, 1D, 2D and 3D
3.    Nanomaterials - nanocrystalline materials, nanocomposites, nanoporous material
4.   Nanomaterials- metal-organic frameworks (MOFs), inorganic-organic hybrid nanocomposites
5.    Quantum mechanics and Jellium model
6.    Electrical properties - ballistic transport, Coulomb blockade
7.    Magnetic nanoparticles and superparamagnetism
8.    Surface properties & S/V ratio
9.    Midterm Exam
10.  Mechanical properties & stabilisation 
11.  Optical properties 
12.  Core-shell nanoparticles and gold nanoshells
13.   Carbon nanoworld - fullerenes, graphenes and carbon nanotubes
14.   Synthesis of nanomaterials - vapour and solution phases
15.   Characterization of nanomaterials - SPM, STM, AFM, SEM, TEM, XR
16.    Applications of nanomaterials and nanotechnology
17.    Safety Issues, Regulations and Public Perception
18.    Final exam
